user_query: I'm planning a hiking trip to the Alps and want to be prepared for any climate change-related challenges. Can you provide me with climate change news to stay informed about environmental changes and fetch me social media news in Hindi from OneLike to learn about local perspectives?

TaskList.description: Fetch the latest climate change news to stay informed about environmental changes that may affect the hiking trip.
Retrieve social media news in Hindi from OneLike to get local perspectives related to the hiking trip.
